movies.title: Joyride
movies.plot: The electrifying journey of a cable repairman at the hands of two lunatic joy riders. In the middle of night, in the middle of winter and, yes, in the middle of nowhere.
movies.simplePlot: The electrifying journey of a cable repairman at the hands of two lunatic joy riders. In the middle of night, in the middle of winter and, yes, in the middle of nowhere.

biography.bio: Fair haired British character actor Christopher Fulford has been a recognizable face on British TV and film for over 20 years in a variety of roles. Most recently he's appeared in the BBC series Servants (2003) as the master butler and in Courtroom drama The Brief (2004). He's appeared in many character driven roles on TV, usually in crime dramas such as A Touch of Frost (1992), Inspector Morse (1987), Silent Witness (1996), and Wire in the Blood (2002). Memorably he appeared as a suspected child murderer in Cracker (1993), a film which had a brilliant twist in the finale. He's also appeared in many films, such as Jack the Ripper (1988), Resurrected (1989), Hotel (2001) and Eye See You (2002).
biography.name: Christopher Fulford

biography.bio: Frank Gallagher is an actor, known for Joyride (1995), All Over Brazil (2003) and The Fall of Shug McCracken (2003).
biography.name: Frank Gallagher

biography.bio: David MacKay is an actor, known for Family Viewing (1987), Joyride (1995) and Speaking Parts (1989).
biography.name: David MacKay

biography.bio: Carolyn Bonnyman is a writer and actress, known for Lark Rise to Candleford (2008), Joyride (1995) and Call the Midwife (2012).
biography.name: Carolyn Bonnyman

biography.bio: Stevie Hannan is an actor, known for On a Clear Day (2005), Joyride (1995) and California Sunshine (1997).
biography.name: Stevie Hannan

biography.bio: Paul Featherstone is an actor, known for Joyride (1995), High Road (1980) and Kelly (1989).
biography.name: Paul Featherstone

awards.award: Torino International Festival of Young Cinema 1996

titlesAwards.titleAwardOutcome: Nominated Prize of the City of Torino
